Главная страница UI Раздел

Содежание

  • Хлебные Крошки
  • Сет цветов
  • Сет цветов соц. сетей
  • Кнопки
  • Пагинация
  • Magnific popup

<%- partial('ui/breadcrumbs') %>

# ▲ Сет цветов соц. сетей

SASS wвета, которые находяться в карте $palette-social.
Еслn нужен какой-то цвет, используй метод color: map-get( $palette-social, key );

map-get( $palette-social, blogger );
map-get( $palette-social, bobrdobr );
map-get( $palette-social, delicious );
map-get( $palette-social, digg );
map-get( $palette-social, evernote );
map-get( $palette-social, facebook );
map-get( $palette-social, formspring-me );
map-get( $palette-social, google-bookmarks-old );
map-get( $palette-social, google-plus );
map-get( $palette-social, instagram );
map-get( $palette-social, instapaper );
map-get( $palette-social, juick );
map-get( $palette-social, linked-in );
map-get( $palette-social, liveinternet );
map-get( $palette-social, livejournal );
map-get( $palette-social, mail-ru );
map-get( $palette-social, memori );
map-get( $palette-social, myspace );
map-get( $palette-social, odnoklassniki );
map-get( $palette-social, pinterest );
map-get( $palette-social, readability );
map-get( $palette-social, rss );
map-get( $palette-social, springpad );
map-get( $palette-social, stumbleupon );
map-get( $palette-social, surfingbird );
map-get( $palette-social, tumblr );
map-get( $palette-social, twitter );
map-get( $palette-social, vk );
map-get( $palette-social, webdiscover );
map-get( $palette-social, yahoo );
map-get( $palette-social, youtube );
# ▲ Кнопки

Базовые стили в файлу src/sass/_partials/buttons-base.scss. Примеры разметки:

<!-- ejs -->
<%- partial('buttons/_sample', {}) -%>
<!-- compile -->
<button class="button">
	<span>
	<span>Lorem</span>
	</span>
</button>
<!-- ejs -->
<%- partial('buttons/_sample', {
	"text": "button"
}) -%>
<!-- compile -->
<button class="button">
	<span>
	<span>button</span>
	</span>
</button>
Кнопки с иконками слева и справа 
<!-- ejs -->
<%- partial('buttons/_sample', {
	"text": "button",
	"before": "arrow-left"
}) -%>
<!-- compile -->
<button class="button">
	<span>
		<svg>
			<use xlink:href="svg/sprite.svg#arrow-left" />
		</svg>
	<span>button</span>
	</span>
</button>
<!-- ejs -->
<%- partial('buttons/_sample', {
	"text": "button",
	"after": "arrow-right"
}) -%>
<!-- compile -->
<button class="button">
	<span>
	<span>button</span>
		<svg>
			<use xlink:href="svg/sprite.svg#arrow-right" />
		</svg>
	</span>
</button>
Активнaя и отключеная (атрибут disabled или класс is-disabled) 
<!-- ejs -->
<%- partial('buttons/_sample', {
	"text": "is-active",
	"before": "wezom-logo",
	"classes": [
		"is-active"
	]
}) -%>
<!-- compile -->
<button class="button is-active">
	<span>
		<svg>
			<use xlink:href="svg/sprite.svg#wezom-logo" />
		</svg>
	<span>is-active</span>
	</span>
</button>
<!-- ejs -->
<%- partial('buttons/_sample', {
	"text": "is-disabled",
	"before": "wezom-logo",
	"classes": [
		"is-disabled"
	]
}) -%>
<!-- compile -->
<button class="button is-disabled">
	<span>
		<svg>
			<use xlink:href="svg/sprite.svg#wezom-logo" />
		</svg>
	<span>is-disabled</span>
	</span>
</button>
Кнопки с любыми атрибутами 
<!-- ejs -->
<%- partial('buttons/_sample', {
	"text": "js-mfp-ajax",
	"before": "arrow-up",
	"classes": [
		"js-mfp-ajax"
	],
	"attrs": {
		"data-url": "hidden/test.php",
		"data-param": {
			"key1": "value-1",
			"key2": 123.54,
			"key3": false,
			"key4": null
		}
	}
}) -%>
<!-- compile -->
<button class="button js-mfp-ajax" data-param='{"key1":"value-1","key2":123.54,"key3":false,"key4":null}' data-url="hidden/test.php">
	<span>
		<svg>
			<use xlink:href="svg/sprite.svg#arrow-up" />
		</svg>
	<span>js-mfp-ajax</span>
	</span>
</button>
<!-- ejs -->
<%- partial('buttons/_sample', {
	"text": "click me",
	"before": "arrow-down",
	"attrs": {
		"title": "Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.",
		"onclick": "alert( this.title )"
	}
}) -%>
<!-- compile -->
<button class="button" onclick="alert( this.title )" title="Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet.">
	<span>
		<svg>
			<use xlink:href="svg/sprite.svg#arrow-down" />
		</svg>
	<span>click me</span>
	</span>
</button>
Кнопки с цветовыми статусами 
<!-- ejs -->
<%- partial('buttons/_sample', {
	"text": "primary",
	"before": "wezom-logo",
	"classes": [
		"button--primary"
	]
}) -%>
<!-- compile -->
<button class="button button--primary">
	<span>
		<svg>
			<use xlink:href="svg/sprite.svg#wezom-logo" />
		</svg>
	<span>primary</span>
	</span>
</button>

	"before": "wezom-logo",

		"button--expand-text"
	]
}) -%>

		</svg>
	<span>button--expand-text</span>
	</span>
</button>

Только иконка и схлопывание текста до иконки на брейпоинтах (список брейкпоинтов из _config.scss) 
<!-- ejs -->
<%- partial('buttons/_sample', {
	"text": "only-icon",
	"before": "wezom-logo",
	"classes": [
		"button--only-icon"
	]
}) -%>
<!-- compile -->
<button class="button button--only-icon">
	<span>
		<svg>
			<use xlink:href="svg/sprite.svg#wezom-logo" />
		</svg>
	</span>
</button>
<!-- ejs -->
<%- partial('buttons/_sample', {
	"text": "сделай ресайз до <code>mg</code>",
	"before": "wezom-logo",
	"classes": [
		"button--mg-only-icon"
	]
}) -%>
<!-- compile -->
<button class="button button--mg-only-icon">
	<span>
		<svg>
			<use xlink:href="svg/sprite.svg#wezom-logo" />
		</svg>
	<span>сделай ресайз до <code>mg</code></span>
	</span>
</button>
<!-- ejs -->

	"text": "сделай ресайз до <code>xl</code>",
	"before": "wezom-logo",
	"classes": [
		"button--xl-only-icon"
	]
}) -%>

	<span>

# ▲ Пагинация
2 3 4 ... 12 13 
<div class="pagination">
	<div class="buttons-group buttons-group--center">
						<a class="button button--only-icon" href="ui.html">
	<span>
		<svg>
			<use xlink:href="svg/sprite.svg#arrow-left" />
		</svg>
	</span>
</a>		<a class="button" href="ui.html">
	<span>
	<span>2</span>
	</span>
</a>		<span class="button is-active">
	<span>
	<span>3</span>
	</span>
</span>		<a class="button" href="ui.html">
	<span>
	<span>4</span>
	</span>
</a>		<span class="button button--disabled">
	<span>
	<span>...</span>
	</span>
</span>		<a class="button" href="ui.html">
	<span>
	<span>12</span>
	</span>
</a>		<a class="button" href="ui.html">
	<span>
	<span>13</span>
	</span>
</a>		<a class="button button--only-icon" href="ui.html">
	<span>
		<svg>
			<use xlink:href="svg/sprite.svg#arrow-right" />
		</svg>
	</span>
</a>	</div>
</div>
<!-- pagination -->
# ▲ Magnific popup 
<%- partial('buttons/js-mfp-ajax') -%>
<button class="button js-mfp-ajax" data-param='{"key1":"value-1"}' data-url="hidden/test.php">
	<span>
	<span>js-mfp-ajax</span>
	</span>
</button>

<button class="button js-mfp-inline" data-mfp-src="#demo-js-mfp-inline">
	<span>
		<span>js-mfp-inline</span>
	</span>
</button>
mfp-inline

Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit. Vitae numquam id inventore odio ipsum dolore natus, temporibus ad nobis quibusdam quaerat, voluptatem explicabo architecto quis?

http://dimsemenov.com/plugins/magnific-popup/ 


<div hidden>
	<div id="demo-js-mfp-inline" class="hidden-wrapper hidden-wrapper--sm">
		<div class="title title--sub">mfp-inline</div>
		<hr>
		<div class="view-text">
			<p>
				Lorem ipsum dolor sit amet, consectetur adipisicing elit.
				Vitae numquam id inventore odio ipsum dolore natus,
				temporibus ad nobis quibusdam quaerat, voluptatem explicabo architecto quis?
			</p>
			<p>
				<a href="http://dimsemenov.com/plugins/magnific-popup/" target="_blank">http://dimsemenov.com/plugins/magnific-popup/</a>
			</p>
		</div>
	</div>
</div>
